title: Add support for pre gazebo-1.0.x model XML in parsing URDF's Gazebo Extensions

content.raw:
Current release of simulator_gazebo (1.6.16) in fuerte is based off the [ fuerte-branch](#!/osrf/gazebo/src/13ac178834e050883f647b5dfb1e4ea926d1db76/?at=fuerte).

To switch to the [default branch](#!/osrf/gazebo/src/7622bd4960caf8584cbba425a79baf5bff529e33/?at=default), we need to tic-toc for the case where Gazebo (0.9.x) XML are included in [URDF's Gazebo extensions](http://ros.org/wiki/urdf/XML/Gazebo).

Once that's completed, it should allow us to switch over to the default branch (Gazebo 1.2.x), where the stability have been greatly improved.

To be fix this, update [urdf parser](#!/osrf/gazebo/src/7622bd4960caf8584cbba425a79baf5bff529e33/gazebo/sdf/interface/parser_urdf.cc?at=default) to test for old Gazebo 0.9.x XML and parse it via [deprecated parser](#!/osrf/gazebo/src/7622bd4960caf8584cbba425a79baf5bff529e33/gazebo/sdf/interface/parser_deprecated.cc?at=default)
content.html:
Current release of simulator_gazebo (1.6.16) in fuerte is based off the fuerte-branch.

To switch to the default branch, we need to tic-toc for the case where Gazebo (0.9.x) XML are included in URDF's Gazebo extensions.

Once that's completed, it should allow us to switch over to the default branch (Gazebo 1.2.x), where the stability have been greatly improved.

To be fix this, update urdf parser to test for old Gazebo 0.9.x XML and parse it via deprecated parser
